tumor_size_max_dimension_evidence: No information provided in the pathology report.
pT_evidence: TNM classification on the basis of this material pT2.
pN_evidence: TNM classification on the basis of this material pN1 and comment/supplementary remark: central bronchopulmonary and hilar lymph node metastases.
tumor_stage_evidence: TNM classification on the basis of this material pT2 pN1 R0, stage IIB and AJCC7 criteria.
histologic_diagnosis_stated: Large peripheral to central, histologically predominantly undifferentiated mixed large-cell and polymorphocellular adenocarcinoma
histologic_diagnosis_evidence: Main diagnosis/diagnoses: Large peripheral to central, histologically predominantly undifferentiated mixed large-cell and polymorphocellular adenocarcinoma of the left upper lobe of the lung.
comment: The pathology report describes a primary peripheral carcinoma of the lung that has invaded the overlying visceral pleura to a minimal extent and also shows central bronchopulmonary and hilar lymph node metastases. The tumor classification of mixed-type adenocarcinoma of the lung is confirmed by immunohistochemical analysis.
